Maiming Strike Information

Possibly Maims your target. They can't move. Flying creatures can't be Maimed.

2 turns Type: Weapon Action Range: 1.5m Melee CON Save to avoid being Maimed Attack Roll Recharge: Short Rest

How to unlock Maiming Strike

Maiming Strike can be performed by using the following items:

Hoppy Selune's Spear of Night Shar's Spear of Evening
